name: Money Bag Run
description:
Money Bag Run 

 You play as a robber in a semi-infinite runner game

Your routes are randomly generated each run you do. There are five stages in your run. 

1. Driving

2. Making your way to the vault inside the bank

3. Breaking into the vault

4. Grabbing the money

5. Escaping through an alleyway 

Controls

A /D - Move Left/Right

Space - Jump

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is an experimental game, all features aren't final and may change/be taken out.

Any feedback is valued.
